meanings.definition: To join together in a union.
meanings.sent1: The workers unionises to negotiate for better pay.
meanings.sent2: The employees unionises to have a stronger voice in the company.
meanings.sent3: The team unionises to form a powerful alliance.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle pieces unionises to create a complete picture.
meanings.sent5: The students unionises to form a study group for exams.

meanings.definition: To organize into a labor union.
meanings.sent1: The workers unionises to demand fair working conditions.
meanings.sent2: The employees unionises to protect their rights at work.
meanings.sent3: The animals unionises to negotiate for more treats.
meanings.sent4: The ants unionises to work together efficiently like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The toys unionises to plan a surprise party for the child.
